languages.text: Обезумевшие офицеры набрасываются на своих товарищей. В кадре мелькает оторванная голова, орошающая все вокруг кровью, и орущий от боли вокс-клерик, держащийся за сломанную руку. Скрутив тех, кого не убили в свалке, служители мостика едва могут перевести дух.

traits.locale_text: Обезумевшие офицеры набрасываются на своих товарищей. В кадре мелькает оторванная голова, орошающая все вокруг кровью, и орущий от боли вокс-клерик, держащийся за сломанную руку. Скрутив тех, кого не убили в свалке, служители мостика едва могут перевести дух.

languages.text: The mad officers are attacking their comrades. The recording shows glimpses of a torn head staining everything with blood and a vox-cleric howling in pain, clutching his broken arm. By the time they have tied up all those not killed in the scuffle, the bridge attendants can barely catch their breath.
languages.original_text: Обезумевшие офицеры набрасываются на своих товарищей. В кадре мелькает оторванная голова, орошающая все вокруг кровью, и орущий от боли вокс-клерик, держащийся за сломанную руку. Скрутив тех, кого не убили в свалке, служители мостика едва могут перевести дух.

traits.locale_text: The mad officers are attacking their comrades. The recording shows glimpses of a torn head staining everything with blood and a vox-cleric who is screaming in pain, clutching his broken arm. Having tied up those who weren't killed in the scuffle, the bridge attendants can barely catch their breath.

Having tied up those who weren't killed in the scuffle, the bridge attendants can barely catch their breath.

By the time they have tied up all those not killed in the scuffle, the bridge attendants can barely catch their breath.

By the time they have tied up all those not killed in the scuffle, the bridge attendants can barely catch their breath.

The mad officers are attacking their comrades. The recording shows glimpses of a torn head staining everything with blood and a vox-cleric howling in pain, clutching his broken arm. By the time they have tied up all those not killed in the scuffle, the bridge attendants can barely catch their breath.

languages.text: Los oficiales enloquecidos atacan a sus compañeros. En la grabación, una cabeza arrancada llena todo de sangre y un voco-clérigo aúlla de dolor, sujetándose el brazo roto. Para cuando los que no han muerto están atados, el personal del puente lucha por recuperar el aliento.
languages.original_text: The mad officers are attacking their comrades. The recording shows glimpses of a torn head staining everything with blood and a vox-cleric howling in pain, clutching his broken arm. By the time they have tied up all those not killed in the scuffle, the bridge attendants can barely catch their breath.

traits.locale_text: Los oficiales enloquecidos atacan a sus compañeros. En la grabación, una cabeza arrancada llena todo de sangre y un vococlérigo aúlla de dolor, sujetándose el brazo roto. Para cuando los que no han muerto están atados, el personal del puente lucha por recuperar el aliento.

languages.text: 一群发了疯的军官正在袭击他们的战友。视讯记录显示，有个人的脑袋被砸开，鲜血把一切都染红了。一位音阵神甫痛苦地嚎叫着，紧握着他的断臂。当舰桥上的侍从们把这场混战的幸存者捆起来的时候，他们已经累得喘不上气了。
languages.original_text: The mad officers are attacking their comrades. The recording shows glimpses of a torn head staining everything with blood and a vox-cleric howling in pain, clutching his broken arm. By the time they have tied up all those not killed in the scuffle, the bridge attendants can barely catch their breath.

traits.locale_text: 一群发了疯的军官正在袭击他们的战友。视讯记录显示，有个人的脑袋被砸开，鲜血把一切都染红了。一位音阵祭司痛苦地嚎叫着，紧握着他的断臂。当舰桥上的侍从们把这场混战的幸存者捆起来的时候，他们已经累得喘不上气了。

languages.text: 狂った士官達が仲間達を攻撃している。映像には、すべてが血に濡れ引き裂かれた頭と、自分の折れた腕を掴んで苦痛に唸るヴォクス・クレリックの姿がチラリと見えた。乱闘で始末されなかった者達を縛り上げる頃には、ブリッジの従者達は完全に息切れしていた。
languages.original_text: The mad officers are attacking their comrades. The recording shows glimpses of a torn head staining everything with blood and a vox-cleric howling in pain, clutching his broken arm. By the time they have tied up all those not killed in the scuffle, the bridge attendants can barely catch their breath.

traits.locale_text: 狂った士官達が仲間達を攻撃している。映像には、すべてが血に濡れ引き裂かれた頭と、自分の折れた腕を掴んで苦痛に唸るヴォクス・クレリックの姿がチラリと見えた。乱闘で始末されなかった者達を縛り上げる頃には、ブリッジの従者達は完全に息切れしていた。

languages.text: Die verrückten Offiziere greifen ihre Kameraden an. Auf der Aufnahme ist ein abgerissener Kopf zu sehen, der alles mit Blut besudelt, und ein Vox-Kleriker, der vor Schmerzen schreit und sich an seinen gebrochenen Arm fasst. Als sie alle gefesselt haben, die bei dem Handgemenge nicht getötet wurden, ringt die Crew der Brücke nach Luft.
languages.original_text: The mad officers are attacking their comrades. The recording shows glimpses of a torn head staining everything with blood and a vox-cleric howling in pain, clutching his broken arm. By the time they have tied up all those not killed in the scuffle, the bridge attendants can barely catch their breath.

languages.text: Les officiers déments attaquent leurs confrères. Sur l'enregistrement, on aperçoit une tête arrachée dont jaillit un flot de sang et un clerc-vox qui hurle de douleur en tenant son bras cassé. Le personnel du pont est à bout de souffle après avoir enfin réussi à ligoter tous ceux qui n'ont pas été tués dans la lutte.
languages.original_text: The mad officers are attacking their comrades. The recording shows glimpses of a torn head staining everything with blood and a vox-cleric howling in pain, clutching his broken arm. By the time they have tied up all those not killed in the scuffle, the bridge attendants can barely catch their breath.

traits.locale_text: Les officiers déments attaquent leurs confrères. Sur l'enregistrement, on aperçoit une tête arrachée dont jaillit un flot de sang et un clerc-vox qui hurle de douleur en tenant son bras cassé. Le personnel du pont est à bout de souffle après avoir enfin réussi à ligoter tous ceux qui n'ont pas été tués dans la lutte.

languages.text: Deliren subaylar yoldaşlarına saldırıyor. Kayıtta kopan bir kafanın her yeri kana boyadığı ve kırık kolunu tutarak acı içinde uğuldayan bir voks ruhbanı görülüyor. Köprü görevlileri, boğuşmadan ölmeyenlerin hepsini bağlamak için yürekleri ağızlarında çalışıyor.
languages.original_text: The mad officers are attacking their comrades. The recording shows glimpses of a torn head staining everything with blood and a vox-cleric howling in pain, clutching his broken arm. By the time they have tied up all those not killed in the scuffle, the bridge attendants can barely catch their breath.

traits.locale_text: Deliren subaylar yoldaşlarına saldırıyor. Kayıtta kopan bir kafanın her yeri kana boyadığı ve kırık kolunu tutarak acı içinde uğuldayan bir voks kâtibi görülüyor. Köprü görevlileri, boğuşmadan ölmeyenlerin hepsini bağlamak için yürekleri ağızlarında çalışıyor.
